placeholders.exampleHobbies: e.g., treibe ich gerne Sport, gehe ins Fitnessstudio...

onboarding.welcome: Let's prepare for the German TELC B1 exam together

descriptions.examStructure: Learn about the TELC B1 exam format and scoring
descriptions.practice: Practice all exam sections: Reading, Listening, Writing, and Speaking

examStructure.title: Exam Structure
examStructure.description: Learn about the TELC B1 exam format and scoring

descriptions.main: Practice reading comprehension with various text types
descriptions.part2: Multiple choice questions about a text

listening.title: Listening Comprehension
listening.part1Description: You will hear five short dialogues and you should solve five tasks.
listening.part2Description: You will hear a long conversation and you should solve 10 tasks.
listening.part3Description: You will hear five monologues and you should solve five tasks.

writing.title: Written Expression
writing.description: Write a formal or semi-formal email

descriptions.main: Practice oral expression and conversation skills
Practice German grammar with gap-fill exercises

profile.title: Profile
profile.appName: German TELC B1 Exam Preparation App
profile.noCompletedExams: No completed exams yet. Start practicing!

alerts.clearProgressMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all your progress? This action cannot be undone.
alerts.clearFailed: Failed to clear progress. Please try again.
alerts.languageChangeFailed: Failed to change language. Please try again.
alerts.signOutMessage: Are you sure you want to sign out?
alerts.signOutFailed: Failed to sign out. Please try again.
alerts.signedInSuccess: You have been signed in successfully!
alerts.signInFailed: Failed to sign in. Please try again.

mockExam.title: Mock Exam
mockExam.subtitle: Telc German B1 Complete Exam
mockExam.importantNoteText: Before starting the exam, we strongly recommend reviewing the exam structure to familiarize yourself with the format and requirements.
mockExam.disclaimerText1: This mock exam gives you a rough assessment of your current knowledge and preparation. However, it is
mockExam.disclaimerText3: that you will pass the real Telc B1 exam.
mockExam.disclaimerText4: The real exam is conducted under controlled conditions and evaluated by certified examiners. Use this mock exam as a practice tool to identify your weaknesses and improve them specifically.
mockExam.speakingNoteText: The oral exam requires human interaction and cannot be simulated in this mock exam. We recommend using the practice area and practicing with a friend, language partner, or tutor.
mockExam.goodLuck: Good luck! Take your time and read all instructions carefully.
mockExam.resumeOrRestart: You have already started a mock exam. Would you like to continue or start a new exam?
mockExam.confirmRestart: Are you sure you want to start a new exam? Your current progress will be deleted.
mockExam.couldNotStartExam: Could not start exam. Please try again.
mockExam.exitExamMessage: Do you really want to exit? Your progress will be saved and you can continue later.
mockExam.finishExamMessage: Are you sure you want to finish the exam? You can review your results afterwards.
mockExam.completeAllSections: Please complete all required sections before finishing the exam.
mockExam.examCompleted: You have completed the mock exam!
mockExam.examResultsNote: ℹ️ This is a mock exam for practice. Actual exam results may vary. Use these results to identify your strengths and weaknesses.

auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign In
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Create Account

help.exampleNote: This is a complete example of a personal introduction for the TELC B1 oral exam. You can use this as a reference to create your own.
help.enterInfoPrompt: Please enter your personal information to generate your introduction text.

sections.discussionNote: Use these questions to continue the conversation with your partner, express your opinion, and share your own experiences.

instructions.taskDescription: Your task: Tell your conversation partner about the following text and then discuss the topic.

progress.loginPrompt: Please login to save and view your progress across all devices
progress.startPracticing: Start practicing to track your progress!

part1.title: Grammar Part 1
part1.subtitle: Fill in the blanks (Grammar)
part1.taskDescription: Read the text and choose the correct answer from the three options for each gap.
part1.incompleteMessage: Please answer all questions before submitting. {{count}} question(s) remaining.

part2.title: Grammar Part 2
part2.subtitle: Fill in the blanks (Lexical)
part2.taskDescription: Read the text and choose the appropriate word from the word bank for each gap.
part2.incompleteMessage: Please answer all questions before submitting. {{count}} gap(s) remaining.

part1.title: Reading Part 1
part1.subtitle: Match headings to texts
part1.taskDescription: Read the following five texts and assign a suitable heading to each text. There are more headings than texts. Each heading can only be used once.
part1.incompleteMessage: Please assign a heading to all texts before continuing.
part1.duplicateAnswersMessage: You have used the same heading for multiple texts. Please check your answers.

part2.title: Reading Part 2
part2.subtitle: Multiple choice questions
part2.taskDescription: Read the following text and answer the questions by selecting the correct answer.
part2.incompleteMessage: Please answer all questions before submitting. {{count}} question(s) remaining.

part3.title: Reading Part 3
part3.subtitle: Match advertisements
part3.taskDescription: Read the advertisements and the situations. Which advertisement fits which situation? There is not a suitable advertisement for every situation.
part3.incompleteMessage: Please answer all situations before submitting. {{count}} situation(s) remaining.

instructions.title: Task:
instructions.description: Read the incoming email and respond to it. Consider the writing points provided.

camera.hint: Take a photo of your handwritten response

evaluation.title: Your Assessment (Written Expression)
evaluation.loading: Evaluation is in progress, this will take a few seconds

imagePreview.title: Review Captured Image
imagePreview.subtitle: Please check if the image is clear and readable.

alerts.cameraNotAvailableMessage: The camera feature is not yet initialized. Please restart the app after recompiling.
alerts.permissionDeniedMessage: Camera permission is required to take photos.
alerts.noEvaluationMessage: Please evaluate your answer before continuing.
alerts.cameraPermissionMessage: This app needs access to your camera to take photos.

part1.subtitle: Short dialogues

part2.title: Listening Part 2
part2.subtitle: Longer conversation

part2.audioErrorMessage: The audio file could not be loaded.
part2.incompleteMessage: Please answer all statements before submitting. {{count}} statement(s) remaining.

part3.title: Listening Part 3
part3.subtitle: Monologues
part3.examWarning: ⚠️ Note: This audio file contains five short texts, each will be played twice. In the real exam, you cannot pause or stop the file.
